name: github_client
description: A module that allows the LLM model to interact with the GitHub API, providing functionality for retrieving user and repository data, creating and managing repositories, and working with issues.

functions.name: send_request
functions.description: Sends a request to the specified GitHub API endpoint.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: The API endpoint to send the request to.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The HTTP method to use for the request (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE).

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to include in the request body (for POST and PUT requests).

functions.name: get_user
functions.description: Retrieves user data from GitHub for the specified username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user to retrieve data for.

functions.name: get_repository
functions.description: Retrieves repository data from GitHub for the specified repository owner and name.

parameters.name: repo_owner
parameters.description: The owner of the repository.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository.

functions.name: create_repository
functions.description: Creates a new repository on GitHub with the specified name, description, and privacy settings.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the repository to create.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the repository.

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Whether the repository should be private or public.

functions.name: update_repository
functions.description: Updates the description and privacy settings of an existing repository on GitHub.

parameters.name: repo_owner
parameters.description: The owner of the repository.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The new description for the repository.

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: The new privacy setting for the repository.

parameters.name: repo_owner
parameters.description: The owner of the repository.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository.

functions.name: get_repository_issues
functions.description: Retrieves the issues for a specific repository from GitHub.

parameters.name: repo_owner
parameters.description: The owner of the repository.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository.

functions.name: create_issue
functions.description: Creates a new issue in a repository on GitHub.

parameters.name: repo_owner
parameters.description: The owner of the repository.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the issue.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body content of the issue.

parameters.name: assignee
parameters.description: The username of the assignee for the issue.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: The labels to assign to the issue.

functions.name: update_issue
functions.description: Updates an existing issue in a repository on GitHub.

parameters.name: repo_owner
parameters.description: The owner of the repository.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository.

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The number of the issue to update.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The new title for the issue.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The new body content for the issue.

parameters.name: assignee
parameters.description: The new assignee for the issue.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: The new labels for the issue.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The new state of the issue (open or closed).
